turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Wim van Norden.
turn.2: In 1988 Van Norden stepped down as member of the board of commissioners.
turn.3: What did he do after that?
turn.4: Van Norden stayed involved in journalism with editorial staff of "Het Parool" asking him for advice.
turn.6: Van Norden voluntarily declined any profits the newspaper made.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: After World War II Van Norden lived his whole life in the Reguliersgracht Amsterdam, in the same house where he worked for "Het Parool" during the war.
turn.10: He was married and has a son and daughter.
turn.12: Van Norden died on 29 May 2015, aged 97.
